VIII.iv.4.B.12.d
.
Determining Entitlement to SMC Under 38 U.S.C. 1114(r) After 1977
After the 1977 decision, entitlement under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)
for any Veterans receiving SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(o)
, or the maximum rate under
38 U.S.C. 1114(p)
, was to be based on whether a factual need for A&A existed.
